ps3.6:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
ps3.6:5.3: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti; āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ … pe … yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti.
ps3.6:6.3: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
ps3.6:6.4: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.
ps3.6:6.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, api ca kho manussānaṃ vā amanussānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā ādisati—
ps3.6:6.6: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
ps3.6:6.7: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.
ps3.6:6.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṃ vā amanussānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ sutvā ādisati—
ps3.6:6.9: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
ps3.6:6.10: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.
ps3.6:6.11: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṃ vā amanussānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vā saddaṃ sutvā ādisati, napi vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhiṃ samāpannassa cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti—
ps3.6:6.12: ‘yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amukaṃ nāma vitakkaṃ vitakkayissatī’ti.
ps3.6:6.13: So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti, no aññathā.
ps3.6:7.4: Evaṃ manasi karotha, mā evaṃ manasākattha.
ps3.6:8.5: Ye tena nekkhammena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:8.7: “Taṃ kho pana nekkhammaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:9.5: Ye tena abyāpādena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:9.7: “So kho pana abyāpādo evaṃ āsevitabbo, evaṃ bhāvetabbo, evaṃ bahulīkātabbo, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:10.5: Ye tāya ālokasaññāya samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:10.7: “Sā kho pana ālokasaññā evaṃ āsevitabbā, evaṃ bhāvetabbā, evaṃ bahulīkātabbā, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:11.5: Ye tena avikkhepena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:11.7: “So kho pana avikkhepo evaṃ āsevitabbo, evaṃ bhāvetabbo, evaṃ bahulīkātabbo, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:12.5: Ye tena dhammavavatthānena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:12.7: “Taṃ kho pana dhammavavatthānaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā, sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:13.5: Ye tena ñāṇena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:13.7: “Taṃ kho pana ñāṇaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:14.5: Ye tena pāmojjena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:14.7: “Taṃ kho pana pāmojjaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:15.5: Ye tena paṭhamena jhānena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:15.7: “Taṃ kho pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ evaṃ āsevitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:16.5: Ye tena arahattamaggena samannāgatā, sabbe te visuddhacittā anāvilasaṅkappāti—
ps3.6:16.7: “So kho pana arahattamaggo evaṃ āsevitabbo, evaṃ bhāvetabbo, evaṃ bahulīkātabbo, evaṃ tadanudhammatā sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā”ti—
ps3.6:17.5: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṃ, idaṃ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ.
ps3.6:17.10: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṃ, idaṃ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ.
ps3.6:17.20: Yā ca iddhi yañca pāṭihāriyaṃ, idaṃ vuccati iddhipāṭihāriyanti.
